name: Sempo
description: Sempo crypto financial inclusion infrastructure with USSD, Android and NFC Payments

SDGs.evidenceText: Unblocked Cash, powered by Sempo, is a blockchain-based Cash and Voucher Assistance (CVA) solution that enables faster, less expensive, and more transparent financial aid for relief efforts. Along with our partners we are changing the way that humanitarian organisations respond to disasters.
